verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w These|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*:

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w complete|strong="H7677"\w* \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H1197"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.” Offerings for the Tabernacle (Exodus 25:1–9)

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* among \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Let \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w willing|strong="H5081"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: gold, silver, and bronze;
blue, purple, and scarlet yarn; fine linen and goat hair;
ram skins dyed red and fine leather;\f + \fr 35:7 \ft Possibly the hides of large aquatic mammals; also in verse 23\f* acacia wood;
olive oil for the light; spices for the anointing oil and for the fragrant incense;
and onyx stones and gemstones to be mounted on the ephod and breastpiece. The Skilled Craftsmen

Let \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w skilled|strong="H2450"\w* craftsman among \w you|strong="H6680"\w* come \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*:
the tabernacle with its tent and covering, its clasps and frames, its crossbars, posts, and bases;
the ark with its poles and mercy seat, and the veil to shield it;
the table with its poles, all its utensils, and the Bread of the Presence;
the lampstand for light with its accessories and lamps and oil for the light;
the altar of incense with its poles; the anointing oil and fragrant incense; the curtain for the doorway at the entrance to the tabernacle;
the altar of burnt offering with its bronze grate, its poles, and all its utensils; the basin with its stand;
the curtains of the courtyard with its posts and bases, and the curtain for the gate of the courtyard;
the tent pegs for the tabernacle and for the courtyard, along with their ropes;
and the woven garments for ministering in the holy place—both the holy garments for Aaron the priest and the garments for his sons to serve as priests.” The People Offer Gifts

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* withdrew \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w stirred|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* prompted \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* services, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* garments.

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w willing|strong="H5081"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* women, \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w brooches|strong="H2397"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w*, \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w necklaces|strong="H3558"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w jewelry|strong="H3627"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w presented|strong="H5130"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H4672"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w or|strong="H8438"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w or|strong="H8438"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* hair, ram \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* \w dyed|strong="H5785"\w* \w red|strong="H8144"\w*, \w or|strong="H8438"\w* articles \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w leather|strong="H5785"\w*, brought \w them|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* could \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w an|strong="H4672"\w* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w contribution|strong="H8641"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Also|strong="H3068"\w*, \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w acacia|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w skilled|strong="H2450"\w* woman \w spun|strong="H2901"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H4299"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w spun|strong="H2901"\w*: \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w skilled|strong="H3820"\w* women \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w were|strong="H3820"\w* \w stirred|strong="H5375"\w* \w spun|strong="H2901"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* hair.

\w The|strong="H2833"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* brought \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* stones \w and|strong="H5387"\w* gemstones \w to|strong="H5387"\w* mount on \w the|strong="H2833"\w* ephod \w and|strong="H5387"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w*,

as well as \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w olive|strong="H8081"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H8081"\w* the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, \w for|strong="H8081"\w* the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H8081"\w* the \w fragrant|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* women \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* prompted \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w freewill|strong="H5071"\w* \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. Bezalel and Oholiab (Exodus 31:1–11)

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Bezalel|strong="H1212"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Uri, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H7307"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w*, \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w skill|strong="H2451"\w*, ability, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w in|strong="H4399"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w craftsmanship|strong="H4399"\w*,

\w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w design|strong="H4284"\w* \w artistic|strong="H2803"\w* \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*,

\w to|strong="H6213"\w* cut gemstones \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w settings|strong="H4390"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* carve \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* artistic craft.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w both|strong="H3384"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oholiab \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahisamach, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ability \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* others.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w skill|strong="H2451"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w kinds|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* engravers, \w designers|strong="H4284"\w*, embroiderers \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w* \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* weavers—\w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w artistic|strong="H2803"\w* \w designers|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* kind \w of|strong="H4390"\w* craft.
